channel.title: [PI]Making mySql highscores online
channel.description:
I followed this guide [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html[/url]
But it does not let me put my IP to make people connect to it. I know nothing of PHP and I don't know how to make it online, it said edit all of the things that say localhost(except one), which I did, but when I put my IP it wouldn't let anyone connect.

item.title: [PI]Making mySql highscores online
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Il code it in for you for some $?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Making mySql highscores online
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

You need to let it connect to you MySql database on your webhost.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Making mySql highscores online
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“ravekitty, post:2, topic:444307”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=546999.msg4010093#msg4010093 date=1339097155]
I followed this guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html

But it does not let me put my IP to make people connect to it. I know nothing of PHP and I don’t know how to make it online, it said edit all of the things that say localhost(except one), which I did, but when I put my IP it wouldn’t let anyone connect.
[/quote]
Which ip did you use, your computer ip or a no-ip.[/quote]
My computer ip
